change.changenote: Section 7 (2) BEFORE amended by 2002-33-5, effective February 28, 2003 (BC Reg 34/2003).

subsection.subsectiontext: An institute may invest its funds only in securities in which trustees are authorized by law to invest.

change.changenote: Section 16 BEFORE amended by 2023-10-261, effective March 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).

bcl:section.bcl:text: A member of an institute is not, in his or her individual capacity, liable for a debt or liability of the institute.

change.changenote: Section 29 (1) (d) BEFORE amended by 1999-28-224, effective January 31, 2001 (BC Reg 347/2000).

paragraph.paragraphtext: with the approval of the superintendent under the Cooperative Association Act.
